attributes.action: remove the term 'honourable' when referring to MPs - for example 'honourable member for ....'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The term is clearly no longer appropriate, and should be replaced with 'Mr', 'Mrs', 'Miss' - 'member for ......'

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Parliament: 
http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
